summary.Summary:
The scene shows a forklift operator moving pallets of boxes in a large warehouse. A worker is manually moving a pallet jack with boxes, seemingly preparing to load or unload. The forklift operator is focused on their task, while the manual worker appears to be struggling with the weight and maneuvering of the pallet jack.
POI_Summary=[{id: Group, summary: Worker manually moving pallet jack with boxes, appears strained and slow.}]
